name: Burt
long_description:
We help teams train and deploy models specialized for their domain and use cases.

Generalist, proprietary models are impressive and have their place but at production scale and usage you need your AI agents to be powered by models that are specialists. Models you own, trained on your data, that can continuously improve for your use cases.

We've helped teams build small, specialized LLMs/VLMs that outperform SOTA models like gemini-3-flash/pro while being 10x faster and cheaper.
one_liner: Easily fine tune and deploy specialized models
